message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I've got to make a profit too. How about we meet in the middle of my previous offer and your offer?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?

I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I think you'll really love the product, and I'm confident you'll get a lot of use out of it. How about we meet in the middle of my last offer and your last offer?
